definition: to comfort/to console/to stroke/to caress/an old term for province or provincial governor
to have children/to raise or bring up/to educate

sentences.english: Like marsupial mammals, Hutts nurse their young Huttlets in special brood pouches.
sentences.chinese: 他們像有袋類哺乳動物，在育嬰袋裏撫育幼崽。

sentences.english: It is emergent task to strengthen the management and tending of cultures in China forests.
sentences.chinese: 加強中幼齡林撫育管理已是我國林業的緊迫任務。

sentences.english: But we also need families to raise our children.
sentences.chinese: 但我們也需要家庭來撫育我們的子女。

sentences.english: He then becomes his assistant in exorcising ghosts and demons when he grows up.
sentences.chinese: 撫育之餘，更傳之驅邪殺鬼之術。

sentences.english: I was nursed in swaddling clothes, and with great cares.
sentences.chinese: 我在襁褓中，受了母親的撫育和照顧。

sentences.english: This paper reports the result of experiments of tending ways for Sapium sebiferum forest.
sentences.chinese: 本文報告對烏桕林撫育方式試驗結果。

sentences.english: Long- term field study regarding biodiversity in tending should be carried out.
sentences.chinese: 對森林撫育對生物多樣性的影響進行長期定位研究。

sentences.english: Gentle body massage is also beneficial for any hand-reared puppy.
sentences.chinese: 輕柔的撫摩對於人工撫育的幼犬是很有好處的。

sentences.english: After planting, tending and fertilization are essential. ;
sentences.chinese: 造林後要加強撫育施肥和管護。

sentences.english: The old birds or the fostered young would gain an advantage .
sentences.chinese: 老鳥和被撫育的小鳥，都會得到利益。

sentences.english: She cherished the child as though he were her own.
sentences.chinese: 她撫育這個孩子就像自己的孩子一樣。

sentences.english: So observe, listen, ask, and parent.
sentences.chinese: 所以請觀察，傾聽，詢問，撫育。

sentences.english: Raised by the sunshine, rains and dews.
And to bring up his son Antiochus, till he came again.
sentences.chinese: 還託他撫育自己的兒子安提約古，直到自己回來。

sentences.english: Thou foster-child of Silence and slow Time.
sentences.chinese: 受過了“沉默”和“悠久”的撫育。

sentences.english: High conservation value forest in Beijing should be protected mainly, and supplemented by appropriate tending.
sentences.chinese: 北京市高保護價值森林以保護爲主，適當的撫育爲輔。

definition: no one to rely on (idiom); on one's own/orphaned/left to one's own devices
to support/to provide support for/to maintain
to be orphaned of one's father
to leave one's native place, esp. against one's will (idiom)
